channel.title: Complicated java question (for me)
channel.description:
I don't know java as well as some of you on this forum but I have no were else to go and I have been trying all day. You know random.misc(1000) for example is a random number pluss 1000 so it's x + 1000 well how do I say in java to have a range 1-5 and only to pick from that range then add it onto 1000. The reason I want this is so I can have random object spawning but only in a sertain area and not all over the entire map so you can acturly see it spawning the random objects.
This is the code im trying to do it to:: [code]if(objectID == 1591) { // sendMessage("You spawn some fire. How glichy he he."); createNewTileObject(3269, 3434, 6818 , 0, 10)) }[/code]
Does anybody know??
I want random 1-5 + 3269 and random 1-5 + 3434 if thats possible thank you?

item.title: Complicated java question (for me)
item.dc:creator: @sirholkms sirholkms
item.description:
@sirholkms wrote:

I don’t know java as well as some of you on this forum but I have no were else to go and I have been trying all day. You know random.misc(1000) for example is a random number pluss 1000 so it’s x + 1000 well how do I say in java to have a range 1-5 and only to pick from that range then add it onto 1000. The reason I want this is so I can have random object spawning but only in a sertain area and not all over the entire map so you can acturly see it spawning the random objects.

This is the code im trying to do it to::

if(objectID == 1591) { // sendMessage("You spawn some fire. How glichy he he."); createNewTileObject(3269, 3434, 6818 , 0, 10)) }

Does anybody know??

I want random 1-5 + 3269 and random 1-5 + 3434 if thats possible thank you?
